txt.en:
'[placeholder], what could ever bring you to Urash Dâr? There are many dangers here. The demon-pit has been opened and I myself intend to flee.

'If you wish to go forth, I urge you to go to Ub Nishir, just north of Maurûsh, and speak with Galâmka there. He will know more and will be in need of your help.

'As for Maurûsh itself, you must stay clear of it. It has been overrun by Orcs and other monstrosities. If you follow the road on the western side of the stronghold, you may find a safe route to Ub Nishir.

'Good luck.'
Speak with Galâmka in Ub Nishir.
Sûzakh has given you directions to a hideout where you can learn more about the situation in Urash Dâr.

'Greetings, [placeholder], what brings you to Ub Nishir?'

You inform Galâmka that you were sent by Sûzakh.

'Ah, Sûzakh. So that is what became of him. As for you, if you wish to help, you are welcome to stay in Ub Nishir.'
Reach Ub Nishir to the north of Maurûsh
Reach Ub Nishir, the camp to the north of Maurûsh and speak with Galâmka
